. It&apos;s a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. MetaMask includes a secure identity vault, providing a user interface to manage your identities on different sites and sign blockchain transactions.

Your transaction is processing and we will notify you once the transaction is complete.
Because your purchase was over 60 ETH, it may take over 24 hours for the transaction to be completed. If you would like to contact us, please reach out to info@minds.com.

Launch your own
social networking app
Start your own white-labeled social networking app for web and mobile by leveraging Mindsâ open source code base.
A platform branded your own way
Harness all of the features of Minds.com with your own design, brand name, domain and style. Set your own policies, develop your own network and contribute to the greater Minds open source project.
The platform includes a wide variety of features, such as analytics, wallet, encrypted messaging, newsfeed, content hosting, blog editing, groups, hashtags, search, payments, advertising and more.
The Minds platform is built for all platforms, including Android, iOS and major web browsers such as Firefox, Chrome, Safari and Brave.
Social networking is an essential tool for communicating inside your own company or reaching people outside.
Stop outsourcing your social media presence and losing all of your reach. Regain direct access to your audience.

All of your work will contribute to the greater
Minds open source project
of building free and open source social networking technology for the world.

Log in
to send a message

creators

Minds Tokens
Morph your channel into a full blown website with your own subdomain or custom domain, newsfeed, logo, theme, categories and footer.

Regain control of your business online
Tired of demonetization, censorship and unfair treatment from traditional social networks? Minds offers a fully transparent, privacy-focused platform with no bias, hidden algorithms or censorship.
Leverage the blockchain and crypto payments to eliminate the middleman and maintain autonomy over your revenue streams.
Upload videos or images up to 60 minutes in length, 4 GB in size and 1080p in resolution. Publish your own blogs with our easy-to-use editor.
Turn off ads, verify your channel, earn a badge and access exclusive content.
Why separate your website from your social network? Join forces with our community of millions of minds.

Expand your reach and gain
thousands of views

Expand your reach and access new audiences. You can exchange one Minds Token for 1,000 boosted views across the network.
Promote your content, group or channel directly in the newsfeed or sidebar of other active Minds channels.

Automate your content promotion by using a Boost Campaign. Set your own budget, choose the length of time to promote the content and decide what audience you would like to target. Then we will handle the rest!
Cut out the middle man and send an offer directly to another channel in exchange for sharing your content, group or channel on their feed to their audience.
We want you to have the option to handle your advertising relationships directly, without any risk of someone getting in the way.
Onchain payments will be published to the public blockchain. You may utilize Metamask or another address. These purchases require a Gas fee.

Manage your accounts and keep track of all of your transactions in your Minds Wallet.

Start building your own revenue streams today!

Every post on Minds has a button to send a tip to the author in Minds Tokens, USD, Bitcoin and Ether. Tipping is a great way to show your support for your favorite channels and allow them to keep creating!

Break free from the

Link your accounts so that every new upload to YouTube also posts to Minds. Import your full video library to protect your content from unfair censorship and demonetization.

Everyone earns
Minds Tokens
based on their daily contribution to the network, which can be used to boost your content and grow your audience.

Minds Plus
and

members unlock additional monetization features, including revenue-sharing and monthly cash payments for pageviews and referrals.

claim a free annual subscription to Minds Plus
.

If you have over 10,000 YouTube subscribers,

.
Tired of the unfair treatment from traditional social networks?
Minds offers a fully transparent, privacy-focused platform built for creators.
Take back control of your social media
Not on Minds? Start a Minds channel
The leading open source social network for Internet freedom. Earn crypto and free promotion for your contributions.
Tokens are the cryptocurrency used on Minds. Your total balance of tokens will be stored in two different types of addresses:
OnChain payments will be published to the public blockchain and require a small ETH gas fee. You can setup your own private keys or use a client such as MetaMask.
OffChain payments will not be published to the blockchain and have spending limits. You will receive rewards into this address.
To receive OnChain payments from other channels (eg, from a Wire or a Boost), you will need to let us know which address to direct these tokens to.
This address will be listed in your wallet as your Receiver Address and can be changed at any time.
Minds recommends using MetaMask for the most seamless user experience.
You can either create a new address here or let us know your existing address.
We&apos;re generating a new wallet address and its private key. Ensure you download and safely store the private key file. The address will be set as your Receiver Address.

The address
was successfully saved as your Receiver Address. Clicking the button below will download its private key. Ensure you safely store the private key file.
Enter your wallet address below to be stored as your Receiver Wallet. Remember that in order to do transactions you will need to have the private key for it.

Please ensure you select the
Main Ethereum Network
.
Note: After installing and setting up MetaMask you might need to reload Minds.
MetaMask is either locked or connected to another network.
Youâre all setup and ready to go!
Great, you have successfully configured your wallet to receive rewards and OnChain &amp; OffChain payments.

To learn more about tokens and crypto, visit the
Tokens 101
section below at any time where you can find tutorials, videos and an FAQ.

Upgrade your channel and
unlock premium features
Support Minds and unlock features such as hiding ads, accessing exclusive content, receiving a badge and verifying your channel.
Click here to request to be verified

Tired of seeing ads? All Plus users have the option of hiding all boosted content from their feeds. Just click on the settings icon on the Boost rotator in your newsfeed and select âHide Boostsâ to turn this on.
View the latest behind-the-scenes content from the Minds team. Plus members will also gain access to exclusive content from MindsTV (coming soon).

Plus members are able to request to
verify their channel
and receive a verified badge.
Just post your Minds channel URL to two other social networks where you have the same identify and provide us with the proof.
Plus members receive a badge for their channel to indicate they are part of the community.
Buying Plus is a great way to keep Minds independent and show your support for Internet freedom.
Post videos, blogs, images and statuses. Message and video chat securely with groups or directly with friends. Discover great content through trending feeds and hashtags.
Earn tokens for your daily contributions and use them to upgrade your channel, boost your content for more reach and support other creators.

You can also receive direct payments in USD, Bitcoin and Ether from your fans or
upgrade
your account to launch your own website and get paid for the traffic you drive.
Your privacy is our priority. You are free to provide as much or as little information as you wish for better recommendations and to connect with people in your local area.

Tips on how to use Minds
The leading open source social network for Internet freedom. Earn crypto and free promotion for your contributions.

The
fuel
of the Minds network
Buy tokens to support Minds and your favorite channels. Unlock premium features and launch advertising campaigns to expand your reach.
1 token = 1,000 views from the network. Launch advertising campaigns, send offers to other channels for more exposure and grow your audience to new levels.
Spend tokens to upgrade your channel to Pro or Plus. Access exclusive content and other custom offerings from your favorite creators.
Send tips and support other channels
Enjoy a post from another channel? Send them tokens to show your support. Tokens help other creators promote their content and build their network.

An
ERC-20
token harnessing the Ethereum blockchain to give you full control over your crypto.

Donât have the funds to buy tokens? You can also earn them as
rewards
for your contribution to the network each day.
Buying tokens is one of the best ways to keep Minds independent and support Internet freedom.

Earn tokens for your
contributions to the network
Each day you will receive a contribution score for your activity on the network.
This score determines your share of the daily rewards pool and results in a payout of Minds Tokens, which can be used to support other channels or boost your content for more reach.
We reward you for the amount of unique engagement received on your content. In order to prevent fraud, you can only receive credit once per engagement type per day from verified channels.
You deserve credit for the people you bring to the Minds network. We reward you with 50 points for every new user that signs up through your referral code and joins our Rewards program.

All of our development is publicly available on Gitlab. Any contribution you make to the code will be manually reviewed in order to determine appropriate payouts in Minds Tokens, Bitcoin, Ether or USD.

Earn
every time you perform an OnChain transaction with your Minds Tokens.

Earn
every time you participate in our Jury system to review appeals on content moderation decisions.

Earn
every hour that you check in to the app and perform an action, such as voting or commenting.

are unavailable due to credit card payment. They will be released 30 days after the payment occurred.

and may take up to 72 hours to complete.

Rewards Tokens enable creators to earn from interactions on their content. You earn tokens based on a daily contributions pool. At the end of each day, your contributions score will be calculated and you will receive a share of the daily reward pool. In order to verify you are a unique users, we require a phone number to be provided. Your phone number will be securely hashed and sent alongside all interactions to protect against fraud and gaming.
Please enter your phone number in order to join the rewards program

One more step! To qualify for our crypto rewards program, you will need to sign up for Minds Plus. This will cost $1 for the first month and $5 for every following month with the option for cancellation. Cancellation will not impact your ability to earn rewards. This is required to help us offset the expensive fees associated with sending SMS text messages internationally!
Please enter the code we just sent you, to verify that your number is correct
This is your public address which will receive Boost &amp; Wire transactions via the blockchain. You can change this in Addresses.
This is your offchain address where your rewards are deposited. These transactions will not appear on the blockchain.
This is your currently active Web3/Metamask wallet. This address differs from what you have configured to receive Boost &amp; Wires via the blockchain.
This is your currently active Web3/Metamask wallet and is also configured to receive Boost &amp; Wires via the blockchain.

Minds is currently running on the
Ethereum Mainnet
.
A refund was issued for this payment. Funds will be deducted from your balance or reclaimed.
This payment was disputed by the card holder.
Payouts will be sent to the bank account below. If you wish to add a new bank account, you can edit the account information below.
You haven&apos;t setup your bank account yet. In order to receive payments and payouts you will need to link your bank account.
Enter your new bank account details below.

Click below to leave the monetization program. You will
not
be able to rejoin in the future.

If you have been invited to participate in and have opted into our Minds Monetization Program (the &quot;Program&quot;), and your participation in The Program has not been terminated, then the following terms shall apply.

By participating in The Program you agree to become bound by the terms and conditions herein (âThe Agreementâ). If you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions herein you may not participate in The Program and are not eligible to receive The Program services (including, but not limited to, Program payments). To the extent that these terms and conditions are considered an offer on behalf of Minds, acceptance of such offer is expressly limited to these terms.
You will comply with all of the terms and conditions contained in the Minds Terms of Service and all other operating rules, policies, and procedures that may be published by Minds.
You will disclose to Minds any paid products or services you employ to refer paid hosting customers to Minds.
You are not authorized to act as an agent of Minds and shall not so represent. You are not and shall not hold yourself out to be an employee of Minds.
You may not factually misrepresent Minds, Minds.com or The Program including, but not limited to, the services, products, and terms and conditions therefor.

You hereby consent to the use of your name, likeness, blog name, and any associated content or logos by Minds in connection with advertisements, articles, and other similar communications conducted by Minds relating to The Program.
You must be at least 18 years old to participate in the the Program. By agreeing to these terms, you represent that you are 18 or older.
Program participants residing in the US must provide a tax ID if required.
Subject to these terms of service, and provided that you are currently participating in the Program:

Minds will pay you 25% of the revenue share of the payments received by Minds by customers who sign up through your Affiliate referral link. To receive OnChain payments from other channels (eg, from a Wire or a Boost), you will need to let us know which address to direct these tokens to.
This address will be listed in your wallet as your Receiver Address and can be changed here at any time.
How the new rewards system works

Minds rewards you with crypto for contributing to the network. The first step in joining our rewards program is to provide your mobile number. We convert your number into a hash ID using SHA-256 encryption and a salt key to create a unique identifier for your account. We do not store your number on our servers.

Rather than rewarding you with Points in real-time, we are now distributing our crypto rewards as a âDaily Reward Poolâ. During the test network, we will be experimenting with how the Daily Reward Pool is calculated, but it will ideally be automated based on user participation once we move into the Main Ethereum network.

Every day, we measure your contributions to the network and you receive a âContribution Scoreâ which can be found in the Contributions section of your wallet. We then calculate how much you contributed to the network relative to the entire community, which determines the percentage of the Daily Reward Pool that you earn.

It is important to note that with the new system, you will only receive credit for unique interaction, and you can only earn credit from another unique user once per metric per day. (If a friend votes on my content 100 times in a day, I will only get credit for 1 vote). This is critical in preventing gaming and abuse of the system as we move into more valuable token rewards. We are essentially measuring how many unique users you reached in a given day.
Daily rewards will be distributed at 02:00 am GMT everyday into your OffChain address.

We calculate your
contribution score
each day using the following weighted scoring system. Please note that the new system only gives credit for unique engagement (users who have provided a mobile number), so not all engagement you receive will be factored into your score.

OffChain tokens are stored on Minds servers, and they can be used the same way that you used your Points. There are no fees, and they can be used to Boost content for more views from the network or to Wire other creators who you support.
You now have the ability to withdraw these tokens into your OnChain address.

OnChain tokens are stored on the
Ethereum
public blockchain and are accessible from outside of the Minds platform, which is key for further decentralization. OnChain transactions, however, require a small Ethereum âgasâ fee, which is the incentive for the Ethereum miners to process the transaction.

Daily payouts are sent
days after a payment has been processed

Monthly payouts will be issued on the
day of the month
